title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, cut pancetta into small cubes and fry in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheeses, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water. Add pasta to the pan with pancetta.
Remove pan from heat and quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture, tossing rapidly to coat the pasta without scrambling the eggs.
Add pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce. Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and half of the spices for at least 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry the marinated chicken until cooked through. Set aside.

Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute. Add remaining spices and cook for another minute.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes until sauce thickens.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken. Simmer for 5-10 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with naan bread or rice.
